actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Mayor of the District of Columbia to convey a reversionary interest of the United States in certain land in the District of Columbia to the Little Sisters of the Poor.

summary.text: Authorizes the Mayor of the District of Columbia to convey to a named nonprofit corporation all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to specified land with all buildings and improvements thereon.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Mayor of the District of Columbia to convey a reversionary interest of the United States in certain land in the District of Columbia to the Little Sisters of the Poor.
